overview: Angelina and Rebeca have been dating for awhile and everything is going fine until Rebeca is caught cheating. Ashli goes to see Tory to politely ask her to stop fucking her little sister. Ashli bites off more than she can chew with Tory, and finds out being a dyke is not so bad after all. Capri`s Mom has had enough of her daughter being a slut, so she takes Capri to an institute for wayward girls. Georgia and Lana are old friends who haven`t seen each other in years. When they finally get back together, things heat up and Lana finds out friends do know best. Aiden has been skipping gym class and now has to make up her final exam. Mrs. Berlin is pissed and decides to take it out on her hot and very sexy student.
title: Hot and Mean 2
